casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, Division of Medical Assistance
v.
PARKER HOME CARE, LLC
and
Division of Medical Assistance, N.C. Department of Health and Human Services
v.
Parker Home Care, LLC No. 175P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Mr. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. Brenda Eaddy, Assistant Attorney General, For N.C. Deparment of Health and Human Services, et al. Mr. Matthew W. Wolfe, Ms. Renee J. Montgomery, Mr. Robert A. Leandro, Attorneys at Law, For Parker Home Care, LLC Mr. Justin Richman, Mr. Richard P. Leissner, Jr., Mr. Andrew M. Walsh, Ms. Evelyn M Savage, Ms. Tracy J. Hayes, Mrs. Carol W. Hammett, Mr. James D. Wall, Attorneys at Law, For Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 10th of May 2016 for Writ of Supersedes of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of May 2016 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
